description: Setting up my portfolio with Fiber took no more than 10 minutes. Since then, my portfolio has attract a lot of clients and made me more than $100k.
I have been getting A LOT of leads ever since I used FIber's premade templates, now I just need to work on my case studies and I'll be ready to go!
I only started freelancing this year and I have already made more than I ever made in ly full-time job. The templates are just so amazing.
